title: June 13th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: June 13th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:subtitle: Jennifer Lopez & Shakira, Royal Family Drama Amidst the Platinum Jubilee, Rebel Wilson getting outed,  + Britney Spears and Sam Asghari Get Married
description:
This week we're talking through a wide range of topics, from providing an overview of Britney Spear's wedding to Sam Asghari to discussing the most recent Royal Family drama during the platinum jubilee. See below for the topics of the week:


Jennifer Lopez & Shakira

  • Jennifer Lopez says it was 'the worst idea in the world' for her to share the 2020 Super Bowl halftime show with Shakira
  • Shakira getting back into the dating game


Royal Family and The Platinum Jubilee

  • Rumors that Meghan Markle and Harry had a rough go at the Platinum Jubilee
  • Meghan Criticized Over Lilibet's Dress While Publication Defends Kate


Rebel Wilson

  • Rebel Wilson having to out herself due to a journalist (Andrew Hornery with the Sydney Morning Herald) threatening to out her


Britney Spears and Sam Asghari Get Married

  • Britney's first husband, Jason Alexander arrested crashing her wedding
  • Opinions on the dress and wedding style
  • Paris Hilton declined DJing for Biden to attend Britney’s wedding




Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
